function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems and air filtration","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI)","People":"Occupants of buildings, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Building owners and managers"},{"Description":"Poor sanitation and hygiene practices","Impact":"Higher likelihood of surface-based disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement regular cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Disinfectants, ultraviolet (UV) disinfection, touchless fixtures and surfaces","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff, and visitors","Owner":"Building management and janitorial services"},{"Description":"Overcrowding and lack of physical distancing","Impact":"Increased risk of person-to-person disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement occupancy limits, rearrange furniture, and promote physical distancing measures","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras for crowd monitoring, occupancy sensors, contactless access systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, and event attendees","Owner":"Building and event organizers"}]}
